text:
君の傷
看ようか?
君の様子…
その…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 7%;top: 7.5%;width: 75px;height: 86px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

font-size: 12px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 26.9%;top: 12.2%;width: 36px;height: 17px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;font-weight: bold;border-radius: 0%;

text:
パンドラを
心配しろ、
オレはいい
style: font-size: 13px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 41%;top: 8%;width: 69px;height: 71px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
傷はすぐ治せる。
ただ血が要る。
途中の自販機で
買うよ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 76.5%;top: 21%;width: 116px;height: 97px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;

text:
無駄口やめて
早く行くぞ。
沢山の敵が
できたぞ、
確実に
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 7%;top: 40%;width: 101px;height: 97px;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 0%;
